title: Revelation Broadcast
outcome: A rogue engineer hijacks city billboards, leaking raw BCI data and internal deliberations. Citizens see how scores were shaped and Council disputes sealed many fates. Widespread outrage, teach-ins, and art actions flood Stenograd: the old calm shatters, and Council legitimacy withers as public pressure mounts.

events.description: Citywide billboards glitch, broadcasting unfiltered BCI logs and Council meeting excerpts alongside fragments of Halden’s diary. Raw data connects score changes to secret interventions.
Spontaneous gatherings and teach-ins erupt as citizens parse the disclosures. Street artists create murals of key revelations, demanding truth and accountability.
Crowds rally in major squares with data printouts, debating the ethics of past Council actions. Accusations of manipulation and betrayal dominate public discourse.
Local officials try to defuse unrest by offering partial system reforms, but protesters demand the dissolution of current Council factions.
